Class GameGUIController

View.GameGUIController
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class GameGUIController
extends java.lang.Object
implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
Class GameGuiController This Class serves as Controller for the GameGUI
Author:
Tobias Celik, Hoang An Tran, Simon Wiethase

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void clickDamageCardsGrid​(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent e)
    This Method registers which Damagecard was selected by a mouseclick and passes the Information to the Context
    void clickedMuteMusic()
    Mutes or Unmutes the Music
    void clickSendPlayIt()
    Eventhandler for the playIT Button, which send a Confirmation Message to the Server
    void initialize​(java.net.URL url, java.util.ResourceBundle resourceBundle)
    This method initialize the GameGUI, retrieves und passes Information and Objects from and to other Classes
    void selectStartPosition​(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent mouseEvent)
    This method is en Eventhandler for Mouseclicks on the Startpanel to register, from where a Player wants to Start It registers which Position was taken, checks if the Player is the Current Player, the phase is the Starting Phase and if the selected Position is a valid startingPosition and passes the Coordinates to the sendStartingPoint Method or Throws an Alert Warning, if something went wrong
    void warningAlert​(java.lang.String title, java.lang.String header, java.lang.String content)
    This Method creates a warning Window

      public void initialize​(java.net.URL url, java.util.ResourceBundle resourceBundle)

    • clickDamageCardsGrid

      This Method registers which Damagecard was selected by a mouseclick and passes the Information to the Context
      Parameters:
      e - MouseEvent

    • selectStartPosition

      public void selectStartPosition​(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent mouseEvent)
      This method is en Eventhandler for Mouseclicks on the Startpanel to register, from where a Player wants to Start It registers which Position was taken, checks if the Player is the Current Player, the phase is the Starting Phase and if the selected Position is a valid startingPosition and passes the Coordinates to the sendStartingPoint Method or Throws an Alert Warning, if something went wrong
      Parameters:
      mouseEvent - MouseEvent Handler
      Throws:
      java.lang.Exception

    • warningAlert

      public void warningAlert​(java.lang.String title, java.lang.String header, java.lang.String content)
      This Method creates a warning Window
      Parameters:
      title - title of the Window
      header - header with little Information about the Problem
      content - detailed Information about the Problem and how to avoid it

    • clickedMuteMusic

      public void clickedMuteMusic()
      Mutes or Unmutes the Music
